attributes.action: Get Tayside mobile safety vans outside schools
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to see the safety camera vans around Tayside used better instead of mainly sat on the kingsway etc.

These vans should be outside schools, play parks and local shopping centre's where they can really have a impact on road safety and protect children from speeding cars!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority and the Scottish Government.
